trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> object on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control is owner-drawn or system-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> é desenhado pelo proprietário ou pelo sistema.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Use os membros dessa enumeração para definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Style property determines the way in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de estilo determina o modo no qual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> será exibido.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects can display simple text or be owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos podem exibir texto simples ou ser desenhados pelo proprietário.

trans-unit.source: Owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects support displaying images or a different font from the rest of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, while system-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are used to display only text (or text and an icon if an icon is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).
trans-unit.target: Desenhadas pelo proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos suporte exibindo imagens ou uma fonte diferente do restante do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle, enquanto desenhado pelo sistema <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos são usados para exibir somente texto (ou texto e um ícone se um ícone é especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).

trans-unit.source: To perform the owner-draw operations on an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Para executar as operações de desenho proprietário em um desenho proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeration and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> classe, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeração e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following codein a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o seguinte codein um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> is drawn by the owner.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> displays text in the standard font.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> exibe o texto na fonte padrão.
